name: Scanner App
description: DO YOU NEED TO SCAN DOCUMENTS EASY, FAST AND SAFE?  Scanner App is the best solution on United States!  There are many applications of document scanner, however, this application offers quick and easy, scanning of documents, qr codes and barcodes, to share or store them quickly.  Scanner App is a small scanner application that turns the Android device into a portable document scanner and scan everything as images or PDF files.  With this PDF document scanner application you can scan documents, photos, drawings, receipts, reports or anything. This pdf document scanner application is fast and designed for the phone and the table.  What is SCANNER IN YOUR POCKET?  Scanner App is a document scanner application that turns your mobile phone into a handheld scanner. Scans are saved on your device as images or PDF files. Name and organization of your scans, or share them by:  - Email - Dropbox, Evernote, Google Drive, OneDrive - Whatsapp  This document scanner application has all the BIG features you need:  * Scan in color, grayscale or black and white * Can be used in the office, school, home and anywhere else you want * Page edges are detected automatically * Thumbnail view of the list, sort scans by date or title * The scanner application is optimized to work very fast. * Universal - a single application that works on the phone and the table too! * Plus you can scan QR codes and bar codes, all in one application!  Download the document scanner application now and make your life simple!
